pipelinemod:handbook-pipemold-text:
Use a pipe shaper tool when the metal is soft to create lead pipes. When cooled completely, you will get a plate instead.

Only lead can be added, as other metals would be too hot and destroy the mold.
pipelinemod:handbook-pipesegment-text: Automatically connects to other pipe sections. Crafted by molding using a pipe mold and a pipe shaper tool.
